result.html: Chuir na comharthaí mearbhall ormThe signs confused me.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir na coṁarṫaí mearḃall ormThe signs confused me.

result.html: Tá mearbhall ormI am confused.
result.ponchtml: Tá mearḃall ormI am confused.

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ga: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.orig: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.html: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí amú agat ó ċaiṫfiḋ mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.orig: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.html: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ponchtml: Seo seo tá a ḃfuil sa teaċ amú ag do ċuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
